title: Faith-Based Organizations
prompt: A wide-angle photograph of a modest white wooden church with a steeple, shot from a distance down a quiet rural road at golden hour, the building weathered and dignified against a vast, open landscape of fields and low hills; in the foreground, blurred hands of an unseen person holding papers or documents, suggesting the quiet administrative work that sustains these spaces; warm, diffused light casting long shadows, a documentary photojournalism aesthetic that conveys both the centrality and fragility of this institution within its landscape.
